briefTitle: Preservative-Free Tafluprost (MK-2452) for the Treatment of Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension (MK-2452-002)
officialTitle: A Phase III, Randomized, Active Comparator-Controlled, Four-Week, Double-Masked Clinical Trial to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Preservative-Free MK-2452 (0.0015%) and Preservative-Free Timolol Maleate (0.5%) in Patients With Open-Angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension in India
summary: This study will test the hypothesis that preservative-free tafluprost (MK-2452) is non-inferior to preservative-free timolol maleate with respect to the diurnal intraocular pressure (IOP) change from baseline after 4 weeks of therapy in participants with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Diurnal IOP Change From Baseline at Week 4 - Study Eye
